summary: Completed comprehensive testing of LSE Hosting Free Version application. All backend APIs (11/11) and frontend features working perfectly. Tested user registration/login, admin panel, credit system with tab visibility, and anti-adblock detection.
passed_tests: Landing page loads with dark professional design
Feature sections visible and styled correctly
Auth modal opens and form validation works
Credit earning system with progress indicator
Admin panel with users table and management
Admin settings panel and config updates
Logout functionality for users and admin
